resources.string: Text will convert to Iyek if You cut or copy starting with "##"\n[Press to change]
Enable auto_cut_Paste when shaking mobile\n[Press to change prefix]
Enable a toast to flash when doing iyek
Maximum word chartecters count limit\n[Press to change]
Automatically flash an english transcripted toast when you cut or copy Iyek words \n[Click to change toast length]\n[alpha]
Enable Iyek and english both pasting\n[Press to change separator]
Enable Phonic typing for better accuracy\n[Click to change phoneme separator]
"Enable a floating widget when you are typing

Kanglei Iyek allows you to interact the auto cut and paste service with Android UI.This allows users with special accessibility needs to not perform that task manually.

Permissions:
-Observe your actions:Allows the App to sellect all the text field. 
-Retrieve window content:Allows to cut and paste the words in the specific EditText box.

Project Kanglei Iyek ki makhada sajaba app amani.Masi sijinnaduna eikhoigi Iyek asibu chaokhatnaba hotnaminasi.Somsu contribute touninglabadi makhagi whatsapp asida changbiraku. Kamdouna masi sijinagadage yengningagadi youtube button asida nambiyu.
